original_title: Paul-Armand Gette au pays des merveilles
overview: This documentary about Paul-Armand Gette talks about the female body, its artistic depiction, about the topic of models and their freedom. Paul-Armand Gette thwarts our visual habits, and provokes our judgements and our prejudices. His models talk about him, with him, and about them.
title: Paul-Armand Gette au pays des merveilles
